name: Brando, Vampire Progenitor
text: If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon this card, then, you can Special Summon 1 Zombie monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Brando, Vampire Progenitor" once per turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can send the top card of both players decks to the GY; Negate the effects of one face-up card on the field.
